name: Get Stars
description:
Get Stars is a game about friendship and life.

Source code available on GitHub: https://github.com/mevido/GetStars

Created for the OGA Summer Game Jam 2019. Ran out of time and had to ship it way sooner than I would have liked. I hope to finish the game after the game jam.

Assets used in this submission (All assets are CC0):

  • https://opengameart.org/content/sunnyland-forest by ansimuz - Almost all graphics.
  • https://opengameart.org/content/flame-creature by eu - Currently serving as a stop sign.
  • https://opengameart.org/content/the-collection-of-8-bit-fonts-for-grafx2-r2 by usr_share- Used for displaying numbers.
  • https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure by SubspaceAudio- Title and Intro music
  • https://opengameart.org/content/the-slimekings-tower-ost-retro-like by CodeManu - Level music.
  • https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effect-pack-vol-001 by Xenocity - SFX
